Title: Relates to providing procedural guidance for the legality of a local law, ordinance, rule or regulation of a town relating to the regulations of vessels
Summary: Provides procedural guidance for the legality of a local law, ordinance, rule or regulation of a town relating to the regulations of vessels pursuant to subdivision one of section forty-six-a of the navigation law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to providing guidance for the legality of a local law, ordinance, rule or regulation of a town relating to the regulations of vessels
